Directions: In a bowl, combine the first five ingredients; mix well. Stir in the beans; pour into an ungreased 2-qt. baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until bubbly.
Ingredients: 5 hot dogs, halved lengthwise and sliced
2 (16 ounce) cans pork and beans, drained
1 (15 ounce) can butter beans or lima beans, rinsed and drained
